MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KA26 Postcode area of Girvan. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers are on site and order to complete a repair due to a fault on our underground cable network. We now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.30AM. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.04AM on 17th December 2020.
